meanings.definition: A small, irritating bite caused by a flea.
meanings.sent1: The fleabite on my arm itches a lot.
meanings.sent2: She scratched her leg where the fleabite was.
meanings.sent3: The tiny fleabite seemed to have a big itch!
meanings.sent4: The fleabite felt like a mosquito bite but smaller.
meanings.sent5: The red mark from the fleabite was hard to ignore.

meanings.sent1: For him, waiting in line was just a fleabite.
meanings.sent2: The delay was nothing more than a fleabite in his day.
meanings.sent3: The fleabite of having to redo the work made her sigh.
meanings.sent4: The constant noise was like a fleabite in his ear.
meanings.sent5: The fleabite of a paper cut can be surprisingly painful.
